channel.title: Shut MoparScape down

This site is a piece of shit and a waste of a domain.

item.title: Shut MoparScape down
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:59, topic:439512”]Even though i frequently complain about the state of the community (mitb & mscp) and it’s useless new staff members, i still support the place. God of Ikiliki was a moron. I’ve been around many, many years and this fellow has entered the scene only recently. He was an incapable individual who had very little idea of what he was doing. His ban was deserved and his community is terrible.

Why do i support this place? Even though Travis and i don’t get along at all, i still appreciate his efforts to keep the whole scene going. Once Kaits closed down, everyone was unsure where it was all headed. We needed a place where we could all gather again. Mopar created this. He let the scene grow once again. His contributions have been countless.

Now i’m fully aware that this half is full of countless morons, yes. However, this isn’t who keeps the gears moving. It’s the hidden people on IRC who contribute the greatest pieces of work. This is our main asset. Rl doesn’t have the 10-13 intelligent members who know more about RS-related topics than anyone (in the scene, just to clarify). Usually this is what occurs:

One of the long time members creates a private project > A dumbed down version is then released to the public, or something outdated > Mscp members modify and change this to create something new.

All those bots that you guys have been using to auto in RS? They do not compare to some of the private projects that i’ve seen or been involved with. There’s more to this community than what you first see. Not only this… most members are all like-minded. All on the quest to attain greater knowledge. We have the resources to great informed individuals, as long as their attitude is correct.

Rl is just one of those by-products and shouldn’t be taken seriously.[/quote]
Correct, I for one usually hate your elitism but I am sure it’s pretty justified… but yes, I also think mopar contributed much more than any of the other forums out there, even though I don’t really care about the forums much, I would still find it unbearable to try to go on any other forums such as RL or RS.

Read full topic

There’s more to this community than what you first see. Not only this… most members are all like-minded. All on the quest to attain greater knowledge.
